title: Juggernauts are 'BALANCED'
body:
I have linked a screenshot. This screenshot is showing the bans of the game, but there is something special about these bans. They are recurring throughout every damn game. THESE SAME BANS. Now flashback to 6.2 and what do we have here??? "Juggernaut changes" because lets make our tanks now deal tonnes of damage!!! Changes and balance changes are all welcomes but when you make changes to specific tanks for no reason other than the devs want to see more people play them because they want to make skins or something along those lines (I don't exactly know the motives behind such ridiculously game breaking changes) is honestly immoral. WHY change them. WHY break the game. You say you don't want to 'force the meta' but that is LITERALLY EXACTLY WHAT YOU ARE DOING. So at least when you talk in a video or release a statement, don't LIE and say "oh yeah we don't want to force the meta and we aren't forcing the meta", just tell the fucking truth. You are forcing the meta and breaking it. These champions are literally getting banned every game for a reason. 

Open discussion

TLDR juggernauts are BROKEN meta forced, riot are imbeciles.

replies.body: Lets take  3 balanced champions and give them a heap of free stats. Darius is beyond broken and Riot should of hot fixed it already. It makes me not want to play personally. You see darius every game in normals.

Here is the thing though. They all have the obvious weakness of being slow moving and very vulnerable to CC.
Hell it doesn't even need to be hard CC, slows are stupidly annoying to anyone who plays a juggernaut.

That third AA from Mord with his Q. You'll never feel that if you just use Stand Aside or Zap, or any of Ashe's abilities.

Darius' pull is not longer broken as fuck and you can actually escape it without being pulled back in. Don't let him get 5 stacks of his passive and he is very manageable.

I don't see why you complain about Dragon Bitch, she's not had any major gameplay changes all year, and Fiora isn't even a juggernaut.

Also seeing your previous posts in the forums are giving me cancer, you're silver 5 aka TRENCH TIER talking like you're an omnipotent all knowing being. As for how you think these tanks are not op, when there is a team to back up the juggernaut, immense suffering follows. It is simply immoral and unfair to have a TANK be dealing more damage than carries.

And you must be new here. It's well known that I play with high tier players and devise strategies and builds for them. There are plenty of videos on youtube and streams with evidence of me DESTROYING Diamond and higher players.

I mean, I'm only a scientist in real life, what would I know about calculating numbers and shit.
